mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(name, price, category, detail, img_url, created_at, admin_id) VALUES ( #{name}, #{price}, #{category}, #{detail}, #{imgUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{adminId} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.admin_id AS adminId, a.name AS adminName, p.name, p.price, p.category, p.detail, p.img_url AS imgUrl, p.view, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM PRODUCT p INNER JOIN ADMIN a ON p.admin_id = a.id ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
